attributes.additional_details: Our nursery staff are expected to continue working during lockdown 3 and we therefore need to protect them by putting them to the top of the list to receive vaccinations.
attributes.background: Nurseries are staying open during "lockdown 3". Their staff need to be put to the top of the list for vaccinations.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566743
